ygData.subject: RE: Value of lambent stones (was AC Dilemma)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I think so.  I just got the song a few nights ago, and while fighting in Rathe Mts. I ve noticed sometimes I ll fire it up on giant skelies (blue to me)
ygData.messageBody:
> From: <kim@...>
>
> On Thu, 11 Nov 1999, JasonF wrote:
> >
> > I tried to Chain/Fear Choon the other night at level 31. My Fear just
> > didn't seem to be taking hold on this guy. It was like he was out of
> range
> > (no resist message), but he was hitting me for 60s and 70s. I dutifully
> > stood at his feet Screeching while he pummeled me trying to get it to
> take
> > hold. Screech *finally* worked and he turned and fled. I had exactly
> 12
> > HPs left at that point, so I decided chasing after him was probably a
> bad
> > idea.
>
> Maybe this "song isn't resisted but has no effect" bug affects
> more than just Pixie Strike...
>
I think so. I just got the song a few nights ago, and while
fighting in Rathe Mts. I've noticed sometimes I'll fire it up on giant
skelies (blue to me) and nothing, no message, no fear.

I do love it when it works though! Especially on red clops, hehe.

One word of warning, don't use it unless you know which way the
thing is gonna run. Was in Cazic at the steps to the temple, and feared
one, hoping it would run up the steps, get brave, and run back down. Nope,
it ran right into the maze and brought back 2 friends. Fortunately the
group had 2 enchanters, so they could control them till we killed them all.
Last time (hopefully) I'll make that mistake.

Bien - Karana
> --
> John H. Kim
> kim@...
>
> > Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to toren@...
> with the subject lol.
